Name: Rejoinder
About the game: Play! Die! Repeat! Rejoinder is an endless, repeatable roguelite game with procedural generated levels where you must defeat the army of skeletons, evil warriors, and powerful bosses. Collect coins to upgrade your sword, and buy stronger potions for your character. Features Destroy your enemies! Defeat powerful bosses! Level up, and collet new weapons and magics! Buy stat potions such as Strength, Speed, Health, Stamina, and more! Play, die, and repeat!. Procedural Generated Levels! Each level has a new combination of factors, monsters, and environment!
